question: Benjamin Netanyahu, who was recently in news, is the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
The Prime Minister of Israel, Benjamin Netanyahu was recently seen in news as he claimed victory in the general elections held in the country. This edition of the election is the countryâ€™s third election in less than a year.
The main exit polls indicated that Mr Netanyahu is in a strong position to form the next government. Netanyahu belongs to right-wing Likud party of Israel. The previous elections held in April and September were inconclusive.
